nodes.text: Yezo was a male Zabrak who served the Galactic Republic as an officer during the Galactic War against the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the war he was stationed in Outpost Zerek on the frozen world of Hoth where he sold stimulants to others from a stall. Yezo wore a white, blue and brown uniform and made use of a comlink while at his stall. He had tanned skin, orange eye and brown hair.

Yezo first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he served as a Republic stims vendor on Hoth. His location was also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, Prima Games strategy guide for The Old Republic.
